survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace Sustainability Initiatives Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees regarding their satisfaction and engagement with the company's sustainability initiatives in the workplace.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with your company's current sustainability initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure familiarity levels. This helps gauge awareness before diving into satisfaction metrics.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with your company's current sustainability initiatives?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainability initiatives are you aware of in your workplace? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify which initiatives are most visible. Helps prioritize communication efforts.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkboxes for multi-choice selection.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainability initiatives are you aware of in your workplace? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the implementation of sustainability initiatives in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice Likert scale to measure satisfaction. Provides a baseline metric for program effectiveness.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the implementation of sustainability initiatives in your workplace?

questions.question_text: What additional sustainability initiatives would you like to see implemented in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Helps identify unmet needs and innovative ideas.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open text box for free-form responses.

script.question_text: What additional sustainability initiatives would you like to see implemented in your workplace?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to participate in workplace sustainability programs if they were offered?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered Q3 with 'Very satisfied', 'Somewhat satisfied', or 'Neutral'
questions.client_notes: Single-choice scale to measure potential engagement. Helps predict participation rates for future programs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How likely are you to participate in workplace sustainability programs if they were offered?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered Q3 with 'Very satisfied', 'Somewhat satisfied', or 'Neutral'
